about_the_game:
Bring home an animal themed pack with a stable full of outfits, furniture, and a mini-story.

Includes:
・5 outfits for Noby and Friends
・8 types of furniture
・Mini-story featuring Doraemon's Gadget: Tracer Badge

Note: You must own the base game to access this content. In addition, you may be required to update it to the latest patch.
This product is available individually and as part of a Season Pass. Please take care to avoid duplicate purchases

*The mini-story triggers in game after completing the event Important: Ch.7 An Old Tale on the To-Do List.
*Outfits can be used after completing the tutorial on Spring Day 4 of the Bulletin Board and the To-Do List for this bonus. After getting an Outfit Pic, head to the basement of your home and use the Instant Wardrobe Cam to swap outfits.
*Furniture can be obtained/crafted at Belle & Oli's Workshop after expanding your house.
detailed_description:
Bring home an animal themed pack with a stable full of outfits, furniture, and a mini-story.

Includes:
・5 outfits for Noby and Friends
・8 types of furniture
・Mini-story featuring Doraemon's Gadget: Tracer Badge

Note: You must own the base game to access this content. In addition, you may be required to update it to the latest patch.
This product is available individually and as part of a Season Pass. Please take care to avoid duplicate purchases

*The mini-story triggers in game after completing the event Important: Ch.7 An Old Tale on the To-Do List.
*Outfits can be used after completing the tutorial on Spring Day 4 of the Bulletin Board and the To-Do List for this bonus. After getting an Outfit Pic, head to the basement of your home and use the Instant Wardrobe Cam to swap outfits.
*Furniture can be obtained/crafted at Belle & Oli's Workshop after expanding your house.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 Ti or Radeon R7 265
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10600K or AMD Ryzen 7 1700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070 Ti or Radeon RX Vega 64
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 35 GB available space

short_description: Bring home an animal themed pack with a stable full of outfits, furniture, and a mini-story.
supported_languages:
English, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Indonesian
*languages with full audio support
